Home » 40P16 Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4)
24 Kusalattika, Upādānadukādi
Kusalattika, Upādānadukādi
46.
128Akusalaṃ upādānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo noupādāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
129Akusalaṃ kilesaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo nokileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
130Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe tīṇi…pe…  avigate pañca.
